bio: Christ follower, Husband, Father, Pastor, Ministry Leader and SocialMedia Coach & Fanatic...that about covers it all. Reformed Theological Seminary Master of Divinity Towson University Computer Science Reformed Theological Seminar Doctorate of Ministry Christian Medical and Dental Associations (CMDA) Minister and Atlanta Area Director LiveTech (formerly Senior TechRally) Digital Educational Strategist Presbyterian Church in America Ordained Minister Campus Crusade for Christ (CRU) Staff & Campus Director
